Detailed Description

Class to store statistics on a BAM file.

BamStats currently stores a map of BamReadGroup objects. Bam statistics are collected then on a read-group basis, but can be output in aggregate. See BamReadGroup for description of relevant BAM statistics.

Member Function Documentation

void addRead ( BamRead &  r  ) 

Add a read by finding which read group it belongs to and calling the addRead function for that BamReadGroup.
